articles.description: The selection committee disregarded its own metric, the NET rankings, in placing the Cavaliers in the NCAA men’s tournament and snubbing teams like Indiana State and St. John’s.
articles.content: Over the years, a lot of teams have made the NCAA mens tournament selection committee look bad by laying an egg after receiving a borderline at-large bid. Many times in those situations, its unfair t… [+6362 chars]
